title: my fiance\'s child\'s father has failed to pay child support for 4 months.  The \system\" is doing nothing. (big surprise) are there any related articles or stories in your paper that can help me figure out how to get through to the system?"
text:
Here's a link to a website that should help you:
http://www.dhhs.state.nc.us/dss/cse/index.htm
